A very good copy given that it's a cam! Audio is clear though slightly echoes (doesn't affect the enjoyment though). Vid though sightly shadowy in places is great quality. Overall vid 8 out of 10; audio 8 out of 10.

This movie doesn't look that great, I didn't see any action whatsoever during the first hour, so I'll wait for a better release.
